content.rendered:
Following the Medusa Group acquisition of Medusa Equip Ltd in June 2018, we would like to advise you of the latest steps towards our full integration within the group.

Medusa Group’s new £9.5M facility in North Shields, North East England, has created factory space for Medusa Equip core product and systems build capability.

From 24th May, Medusa Equip’s current facility in Broadheath, Altrincham will cease to manufacture product and during the immediate few weeks production will be transitioned entirely to Medusa Group Newcastle.

Medusa Equip’s existing Sales, Supply Chain, Engineering, Finance and General Management activities will remain in Broadheath but will be relocated to new offices nearby our current office.

  • From 24th May all Medusa Equip part supplier deliveries and Medusa Equip product collections will be continue to be coordinated by our Broadheath team but will require to be delivered/collected at – Medusa Group, Unit L5, Intersect 19, Tyne Tunnel Estate, North Shields, NE29 7UT
  • From 3rd June all phone and email communications with our office staff will remain as they are but we will be located at our new offices –
    Earle House, Atlantic St, Altrincham WA14 5DD **This will be our new postal address from 3rd June.

Whilst we do not anticipate any issues during the transition, your continued cooperation during this period is greatly appreciated.
